profile:
PRE-LOCK Security Services IS TORONTO BASED Smart Home Alarm.com Authorized Service Provider & Locksmith Security Service Provider with a modern retail shop and show room.  We are an all Canadian security provider.  We have over 30 Mobile Service Vehicles ready when you are.  

We offer  24 HOUR ALARM MONITORING & 24 HOUR LOCKSMITH SERVICES, INCLUDING CAMERAS, SAFES, LIGHTING,  VISIT Our Store LOCATED AT 800 PETROLIA ROAD, UNIT 1.

WE ARE FACTORY AUTHORIZED MEDECO & MUL-T-LOCK TRAINED LOCKSMITH'S AND SERVICE AND SELL DSC, Honeywell, Napco, Crestron, & ELK Home & Business security alarm systems.  We provide interactive alarm systems that you can control with your smartphone.   

WE ARE ULC LISTED FIRE AND BURGLAR ALARM SERVICE PROVIDER WITH OUR ULC LISTED LOCAL MONITORING STATION LOCATED IN Toronto. 


We are Alarm.com authorized Dealer and happy to make your home into a Smart Home Today!!

WE PROVIDE HOME & BUSINESS ALARM MONITORING WITH 6 MONTHS FREE ON TAKE OVER SYSTEMS JUST FOR SIGNING UP WITH US WHEN YOU TELL US YOU FOUND US ON HOME STARS 

Our 24 hour locks & Locksmiths technicians are available around the clock in the Greater-Toronto Area with fully equipped mobile service vehicles that are GPS tracked for prompt reliable services.   Pre-Lock Security provides integrated physical & electronic security solutions that separate our company from most security providers.  

We have built our business Since 1978 by bundling our security services and knowledge with proven effective security solutions that need to be taken to insure your property and family understand our unique balanced approach of security integration.   

Our factory trained alarm, lock, camera, security film and safe technicians are bonded and insured to provide your home, family & business security professionals that you can truly count on.

Let our security professionals show you why "Better Lock Next Time" is more than just our slogan.

Let our loss prevention experts show you why Pre-Lock Security has been voted number one by consumers over the many years in business.    

The Mul-T-Lock High Security Certified Professional logo indicates that the locksmith:


Follows strict security measures
Has completed extensive product training
Conforms to legal requirements
Dedicated to customer satisfaction
Guarantees their workmanship

Why Would You Deal With A Locksmith that is not a Certified Professional?

profile:
Since 1994, over 20,000 Canadian home and business owners have chosen PROTECTION PLUS® to provide them with customized, integrated security solutions. 

PROTECTION PLUS® is Canada's Premier Authorized Honeywell Security Dealer, Resideo, Qolsys, ALARM-i Video Alarm Verification and ALARM.com. 
Other premium brands we use include MUL-T-LOCK, MEDECO, ALARM-i, Madico Security Film, Openpath Access Control and more. 
We are one of a select few companies in Canada that are U.L.C. listed for Commercial Alarm Installations. 

PROTECTION PLUS® provides customers with professionally designed, installed and serviced residential and commercial security solutions. 
Our Residential and Commercial services include; 
Alarm Systems / Video Alarm Verification / Locksmith / High Security Locks / Door & Window Reinforcements / 
Security Camera Systems / Thermal Cameras/ Standard and Video Intercoms/ Access Control / Security Bars and Gates / Security Window Film / Remote Services / Smart Monitoring / Fire and Life Safety Protection / Monitoring Service / Automatic Door Openers / Police and Private Guard Response and more...

Ask about us creating a customized security solution that fits your unique requirements and your budget. 

Call 1-855-365-PLUS (7587) and speak with one of our Security Experts and set up a no-obligation SECURITY AUDIT of your home or business today!

profile: Since opening our doors, we’ve been committed to providing service of the highest quality, paying particular attention to working efficiently while keeping the lines of communication with our clients clear and concise.
